How many people are affected by pseudohypoaldosteronism type 2 ?,"PHA2 is a rare condition; however, the prevalence is unknown.",GHR,pseudohypoaldosteronism type 2
What are the genetic changes related to pseudohypoaldosteronism type 2 ?,"PHA2 can be caused by mutations in the WNK1, WNK4, CUL3, or KLHL3 gene. These genes play a
